# @heroui/motion

Mirror package of framer-motion

## Installation

```sh
yarn add @heroui/motion
# or
npm i @heroui/motion
```

## Contribution

Yes please! See the
[contributing guidelines](https://github.com/heroui-inc/heroui/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)
for details.
